name: Ravenra
description: Ravenra is revolutionizing 3D creation with a native AI engine built specifically for generating real, usable assets. Unlike traditional tools that simulate, Ravenra truly generates production-ready 3D models, scenes, and environments in seconds using simple text prompts or sketches. No skills or pipelines required, just fast, clean, mesh-ready outputs that integrate seamlessly into games, films, AR/VR, and digital worlds. With a powerful API, creators and studios can instantly bring imagination to life and make 3D creation programmable. Ravenra is the missing creation layer 3D has been waiting for, built for visionaries shaping the future.
